text: Edward Arnold Chapman (16 November 1914 – 11 December 1997) was an English criminal and wartime spy. During the Second World War he offered his services to Nazi Germany as a spy and soon became a British double agent. His British Secret Service handlers codenamed him Agent Zigzag. ==Other websites== * WHERE THE RABBIT IS LIKELY TO PASS US Defence Intelligence Agency uses Eddie Chapman case as an example] by A Denis Clift, President Joint Military Intelligence College Harvard University 15 January 2002 * Obituary Eddie Chapman – The Telegraph 1997 * Double Agent: The Eddie Chapman Story at bbc.co.uk, first broadcast 15 November 2011 Category:1914 births Category:1997 deaths Category:British intelligence people Category:British people of World War II Category:English criminals Category:Spies
title: Eddie Chapman
